sentences.sContent: Back then, such a high-definition TV would set you back around $1, 500.
sentences.sContent_eng: Back then, such a high-definition TV would set you back around $1, 500.
sentences.sCn: 那时候，买这样一台高清晰度电视机要花上大概1,500美元。

trans.tranOther: a high-definition television or computer shows images very clearly
